commands.name: search-image-with-google-lens
commands.title: Search Image with Google Lens
commands.description: Search Image with Google Lens by taking a screenshot or selecting an image in Finder

preferences.name: turnOffUploadAlert
preferences.label: Turn off upload alert
preferences.title: Upload Image Alert
preferences.description: Turn off the upload alert when uploading an image to Google Lens

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
